meanings.definition: Ironmongery: hardware or small metal goods collectively.
meanings.sent1: The local store sells various ironmongery like nails and screws.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker purchased some ironmongery for the project.
meanings.sent3: When the robot needed a fix, it asked for a dose of ironmongery.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was a treasure trove of colorful ironmongery.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith's shop was filled with the glint of ironmongery.

meanings.definition: Ironmongery: the business of a dealer in iron goods.
meanings.sent1: My uncle's ironmongery has been in the family for generations.
meanings.sent2: The ironmongery down the street always has the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The ironmongery owner joked that he had iron in his veins.
meanings.sent4: In the world of construction, ironmongery is the backbone of business.
meanings.sent5: The success of the ironmongery relied on quality products and service.
